title: TechWisdom Technologies
subtitle: Official Agency Website
description: The digital home for TechWisdom Technologies, a software agency co-founded to deliver high-end digital solutions. The site showcases the agency's mission, service offerings, and technological expertise.
story: Building this site was about more than just code; it was about defining a brand identity and a professional standard for our agency's clients.

title: Cambry
subtitle: Study Abroad Agency Platform
description: A specialized platform designed for a study abroad agency to manage student applications, university partnerships, and consultation scheduling.
story: This project required a deep focus on user trust and information architecture, ensuring students could navigate complex international education paths easily.

title: Juta Express
subtitle: E-commerce for Footwear Imports
description: A high-performance e-commerce platform specializing in quality shoes imported from China to the Bangladesh market. Includes real-time inventory and a local payment gateway.
story: Juta Express streamlines cross-border commerce, solving the logistical and technical hurdles of bringing international products to a local audience.

title: Tech Command Center
subtitle: Custom CMS for Scalable Content
description: A tailored Content Management System (CMS) designed for high flexibility and performance, allowing for custom data structures and internal administration of agency assets.
story: Off-the-shelf CMS solutions weren't enough for our workflow. I built this to give us complete control over our content strategy and deployment.

title: News Portal PH
subtitle: Dynamic Multi-category News Engine
description: A robust news portal optimized for high-traffic content delivery. It supports real-time updates, ad management, and mobile-responsive layouts for mass readers.
story: Information speed is everything. This project helped me master high-frequency API polling and frontend state management.

title: Fitness Centre PH
subtitle: Gym & Health Management Platform
description: A dedicated management system for fitness centers, enabling member tracking, class scheduling, and progress visualization for users.
story: I wanted to combine technical utility with wellness, creating a dashboard that actually makes it easier for people to stay consistent with their health.
